HOME.TITLE: Registration System for JISIC2021
HOME.NAMESMSG: * Names can only be letters and is required
HOME.LASTNAMESMSG: * The Last names can only be letters and is required
HOME.PHONEMSG: * Phone can only be numbers and is required
HOME.EMAILMSG: * Email must be correct and is required
HOME.IDENTIFICATIONMSG: * Identification can only be numbers and is required
HOME.PASAPORTEMSG: * Passport can only be letters, numbers and is required
